original: ākṛtirthyādi śabdārthaḥ kasya syuḥ prokṣaṇādayaḥ / kena cejyeta na tyāga ākṛtarupapadyate /

amūrtā hi ākṛtiḥ nityā na avaghāta ādi bhājanī

original: tadvidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā tenāsyā nāvakalpate  vroddīnavahanti, paśuṃṃ saṃjñapayati, somamabhiṣuṇoti, pāvayati, somena paśunā brīhibhiśva yajataiti yāvanta evamādayo vināśimūrttimadviṣayāḥ saṃskārāḥ prayojanasiddhyarthā vā teṣāṃ prayogacodanāyā ākṛtāvabhāvātau tu bhāvātkāryyapradhānatvācca padārthapratītervidhyadhīnatvācca sarvapuruṣaceṣṭānāmavaśyaṃ vidhiviṣayatva yogya vākyārthapūraṇasamarthapadārthakalpanamaṅgī karttavyam /
analyzed: tad vidhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vā tena asyāḥ na avakalpate paśum saṃjñapayati somam abhiṣuṇoti pāvayati somena paśunā brīhibhiḥ ca yajata eti yāvantaḥ evamādayaḥ vināśi mūrttimat viṣayāḥ saṃskārāḥ prayojana siddhi arthāḥ vā teṣām prayoga codanāyāḥ ākṛtau abhāvātau tu bhāvāt kāryya pradhāna tvāt ca padārtha pratīteḥ vidhi adhīna tvāt ca sarva puruṣa ceṣṭānām avaśyam vidhi viṣaya tva yogya vākya artha pūraṇa samartha padārtha kalp

original: tathā yadapi brāhmaṇo na hantavyona kalajaṃ bhavayitavyamityādipratiṣedhavidhānaṃ tadapi prāptipūrvakatvaṃ sāpekṣatvāktau ca prāptisaṃbhavādākṛteścāna dhikārādasatyāṃ prāptāvanarthaṃkameva syāt /
analyzed: tathā yat api brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ na kalajam bhavayitavyam ityādi pratiṣedha vidhānam tat api prāpti pūrvakatvam sāpekṣa tva aktau ca prāpti saṃbhavāt ākṛteḥ ca an adhikārāt asatyām prāptau anarthaṃkam eva syāt

original: ta smādyena śabdārthena prayogacodanānāṃ bhāvo bhavati sa evābhyupagantuṃ nyāyyo na tattvajñānamātradṛṣṭasiddhyarthapadārthakalpanā yukteti /

tat asat

original: nyāyena hi sthitamekasya śabdasyāyeṃ kyamanava sthita saṃvandhāne kādṛṣṭa vācaka śakti kalpanavikalpadoṣaprasaṅgāt /

original: yasya tu padasya yorthobhidheyatvenāśritastasya tatparihārāsaṃbhavāḍhavaṇyaṃ tatrasthasyaivārthāntaraṃ lākṣaṇikatvenābhyupagantavyaprathamādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pāda /
analyzed: yasya tu padasya yaḥ ṛthaḥ abhidheya tvena āśritaḥ tasya tad parihāra asaṃbhavāt ḍhavaṇyam tatrasthasya eva arthāntaram lākṣaṇika tvena abhyupagantavya prathama adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pāda

original: mityapi cākṛtipadārthakasya vyaktiṣu sādhāraṇānaikāntikatvānirṇayo na syāhyaktipadārthakasya punaratyantāntarbhūtākṛtiniścayasiddherna śabdavyāpārakalpanopapattiḥ /
analyzed: m iti api ca ākṛti pada arthakasya vyaktiṣu sādhāraṇa anaikāntika tva anirṇayaḥ na punar atyanta antarbhūta ākṛti niścaya siddheḥ na śabda vyāpāra kalpanā upapattiḥ

original: na ca vikalpasamañcaya saṃbandha samudāyānyatara viśiṣṭānyatarābhidhānapaścāḥ saṃbhavantyavibhāgādeva sarveṣāmapi jñānasiddheḥ

original: gośabdādīnāmākṛtivacanatve gauḥ śuklo 'ruṇayā piṅgācyaikacāyanyā gavā krīṇātīti ṣaḍ gāvo deyā ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyādityevamādiṣu prayogeṣu sarveṣāṃ jātiguṇamātravacanatvātmāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na prāpnoti
analyzed: go śabda ādīnām ākṛti vacana tve gauḥ śuklaḥ ruṇayā gavā krīṇāti iti ṣaḍ gāvaḥ deyāḥ ekām gām dakṣiṇām dadyāt iti evamādiṣu prayogeṣu sarveṣām jāti guṇa mātra vacana tvāt māmānādhikaraṇyam na prāpnoti

original: nahi gotvākṛtiḥ śuklā nāruṇā nāpi ṣaḍguṇā /
analyzed: nahi go tva ākṛtiḥ śuklā na aruṇā na api ṣaḍguṇā

original: jātiguṇaviśiṣṭa vyaktivacanatvena śuddhavyaktivacanatvena vā pratyase bhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tacca tatra dravyama evaṃvidhamapi samānadravyaśabdatvaṃ tvatpace na syāditi nañā tadabhāvaprasaṅgaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: jāti guṇa viśiṣṭa vyakti vacana tvena śuddha vyakti vacana tvena vā bhavati sāmānādhikaraṇyam tat ca tatra dravyam evaṃvidham api samāna dravya śabda tvam tvad pace na syāt iti nañā tad abhāva prasaṅgam darśayati

original: yatta bhāṣyakāro viparītārthena dravyaśabdenaiva tadāśrayagulāyā nanñaścāsamartha samāsamaṅgīkṛtya na dravyāśrayavacanaḥ śabdo bhavedākṛtivādina ityāha /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāraḥ viparīta arthena dravya śabdena eva samāsam aṅgīkṛtya na dravya āśraya vacanaḥ śabdaḥ bhavet ākṛti vādinaḥ iti āha
tat ati kliṣṭam vyadhikaraṇa nirdiṣṭa guṇa prayoga ahem ca iti upeścitavyam
tatra api mā

original: dravyāśrayasya guṇasya yaḥ śabdo 'dravyaśabdaḥ sa ākṛternirguṇatvādekavākya saṃbandhaṃ gotvaṃ śuklamityādivanna pratipadyate/
analyzed: dravya āśrayasya guṇasya yaḥ śabdaḥ dravya śabdaḥ saḥ ākṛteḥ nirguṇa tvāt eka vākya saṃbandham go tvam śuklam ityādi vat na pratipadyate

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyacodyaṃ tu svapakṣepya viśeṣāttadānīmapyanupapannameveti pūrvaiva vyākhyā karttavyā /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇya codyam tu sva pakṣepya viśeṣāt tadānīm api anupapannam eva iti pūrvā eva vyākhyā karttavyā

original: kiṃ ca naiveṣṭakābhirākṛtisaṃpādanamabhyupagataṃ yataḥ svabhāvātsnāyvādyārabdhadravyasa bhavāyitvenopālambhaḥ syātpiṣṭa piṇḍasiṃhavatmādṛśya saṃpattiḥ pakṣadvayepi codanārthaḥ sā tvākṛtyantaravilaśaṇaśyenākṛtyā syānna tu vyaktyantara vilavaṇaśyena viśeṣeṇāsādhāraṇena vā /
analyzed: kim ca na eva iṣṭakābhiḥ ākṛti saṃpādanam abhyupagatam yatas svabhāvāt snāyu ādi ārabdha dravya sa bhavāyi tvena upālambhaḥ syāt piṣṭa piṇḍa siṃha vat mādṛśya saṃpattiḥ pakṣa dvaye api codana arthaḥ sā tu ākṛti antara vilaśaṇaśyena ākṛtyā syāt na tu vyakti antara vilavaṇaśyena viśeṣeṇa asādhāraṇena vā

original: nirvika rūpatvātsāmānya viśeṣānapekṣaṃ vyaktimātrasādṛśyama vidheyaṃ, sarvadravyeṣu tulyatvāt /

original: ekavyaktiparigrahācca vyaktyantareṇa sādṛśyaṃ na kāryyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: eka vyakti parigrahāt ca vyakti antareṇa sādṛśyam na kāryyam syāt
vid kriyā vyaktau śabda arthena saṃbhavati
na sādhakatamaḥ iti

original: nayevaṃ smṛtiḥ prayenaiścīyate iti śyenaci “tkarmaṇyagnyākhyāyā” miti hi sā prayenaṃ cayanena sādhayeditīmitatamatvam /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ prayenaiḥ cīyate iti śyena cit karmaṇi agni ākhyāyām iti hi sā prayenam cayanena sādhayet iti imitatama tvam
tatra api mukhya asaṃbhava ātmādṛgya parigrahaḥ

original: asādhāraṇe śabda pravṛttya saṃbhavādavyapadegyatvena ca sarvatrāviśeṣātmāmānyākāreṇa ca nirūpaṇe vikalpāyāpakāpekṣayā vyāpyasāmānyasya naivaṃ viśeṣavyāpyāpekṣayetaradākṛtiḥ /
analyzed: asādhāraṇe śabda pravṛtti a saṃbhavāt avyapadegya tvena ca sarvatra aviśeṣāt māmānya ākāreṇa ca nirūpaṇe vikalpa āyāpaka apekṣayā vyāpya sāmānyasya na evam viśeṣa vyāpya apekṣayā itarat ākṛtiḥ
tatra viśeṣa pakṣe saṃbandha ananvākhyāna vyabhicāra sāmānya buḍi abhāva prati artha śakti kalpanā ādayaḥ doṣāḥ

original: na ca yatra saṃśayastatpratyāyyaṃ bhavatīti nirviṣayatā śabdasya /

etena svatantra ubhaya abhidhāna mārgaḥ pratyuktaḥ
vyakti viśi prākṛti mārgaḥ upi na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇa iti nyāya ākteḥ prathama grahaṇa prasaṅgāt

original: saṃbandhasamudāyayorapi svarūpapratyayābhāvātsarvatra cā viśeṣādavaṇyaṃ saṃbandhisamudāyiviśeṣaṇatābhyupagantavyā bhavati /
analyzed: saṃbandha samudāyayoḥ api svarūpa pratyaya abhāvāt sarvatra ca viśeṣāt avaṇyam saṃbandhi samudāyi viśeṣaṇa tā abhyupagantavyā bhavati
tatra api śakti traya kalpanā
vyakti aṃśe ca ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ
na ca prathama adhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pāda

original: vyaktyā kṛtyorbhinna kāryayorguṇapradhānanānāvasthayoḥ samudāyopagamanaṃ yuktamanatyantabhedācca bhinnadhamma saṃbandhasamudāyau na yuktau /
analyzed: vyaktyā kṛtyoḥ bhinna kāryayoḥ guṇa pradhāna nānā avasthayoḥ samudāya upagamanam yuktam anatyanta bhedāt ca bhinna dhamma saṃbandha samudāyau na yuktau

original: ākṛtiviśiṣṭopi vyaktiviśeṣo naiva pratīyate vyaktiviśeṣabuddhyabhāvād vyaktimātramiti cenna /

tadānīm tasya ākṛtitaḥ nyatvena anirūpaṇāt
mātra śabdaḥ hi sāmānya vācī iti ākṛtiḥ eva ucyate

original: nānākāreṣu ca vastuṣa tadbhedānusāritvācchaktīnāmanvayavyatire kābhyāṃ gotvākāranibandhanaiva gośabdavācyatvaśaktirgamyate /
analyzed: nānā ākāreṣu ca tad bheda anusāri tvāt śaktīnām anvaya vyatirekābhyām go tva ākāra nibandhanā eva go śabda vācyatva śaktiḥ gamyate

original: sāhi pratīyate niṣṭarūpā kriyāyoginī tu vyaktyupetā bhavatyeveti prokṣaṇāveśaṇādi tu na kathaṃ cinna saṃbhavati /

viśasana ādi api tu vyakti a vyatireka apekṣayā saṃbhavati eva
tathā hi
paśu ādiṣu apanīta aṅgeṣu viśeṣa buddhi abhāva ātma āmānya rūpā eva viśasana ādi viśiṭā buddhiḥ dṛṣṭā
nanu evam anityā kṛtiḥ syāt tena aṃśena iṣṭā eva āśra ya antara avināśāt tu sarvaiḥ api avināśaḥ uvaṇyam eva eṣṭavyaḥ

original: tena yattāvanmātrameva tasya vināśo 'nekadeśasya tu na kathaṃ cidvināśaḥ syādityubhayathā vyavahāraḥ /
analyzed: tena yat tāvat mātram eva tasya vināśaḥ neka deśasya tu na katham cit vināśaḥ syāt iti ubhayathā vyavahāraḥ
atyanta vyatireke tu na eṣa dharma vidhi viṣayaḥ vyatratiṣṭheta
na ca paśu tvam mamūrtta tvāt

original: tadupalacitaṃ tu yaddavyaṃ taddavyatvāhate na tādrūpyeṇa gamyataityekārthaṃ samavāyāvyāpakatvācca dravyaṃ gamayitavyaṃ, tatrāpyamūrttatve doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tad upalacitam tu yat davyam tat davya tva āhate na tādrūpyeṇa gamyate eti ekārtham samavāya avyāpaka tvāt ca dravyam gamayitavyam tatra api amūrtta tve doṣaḥ
āśraya upakṣaṇāt ca dravya mātra prasaṅgaḥ
viśeṣaḥ tu paśu tvasya vā dravya tvasya vā vyāpaka tvāt agamyaḥ
na vā pratītam vidhinā saṃbadhyate
na ca yatra saṃśayaḥ tat pratītam

original: na cānyatrokto dharmastatrāsaṃbhavādanyatra kā ryyastasmānna sāmānyakṛto viśeṣeṣu yuktaḥ, viśeṣā api vyapade śātsāmānya mevetyamūrttatā /
analyzed: na ca anyatra uktaḥ dharmaḥ tatra asaṃbhavāt anyatra kāryyaḥ tasmāt na sāmānya kṛtaḥ viśeṣeṣu yuktaḥ viśeṣāḥ api vyapade śāt sāmānyam eva iti amūrtta tā
asādhāraṇena tu nā eva vyavahāraḥ tasmāt anirūpyaḥ dharma vidhi viṣayaḥ

original: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu vyatirekābhyupagamenāśrayamācagatiruktā, viśeṣarūpā na kadā cid vyaktiḥ pratīyate /
analyzed: bhāṣyakāreṇa tu vyatireka abhyupagamena āśraya māca gatiḥ uktā viśeṣa rūpā na kadā cid vyaktiḥ pratīyate
yaḥ upyāyi bhāvaḥ saḥ upi aupacārikaḥ

ākṣepa mātra bhāvāt atha vā etad viṣayaḥ eva ayam prapañcaḥ
kim śabdena akṛtyāḥ vā iti

original: yo hi dhūmādagnitvaṃ pratipadyate tasya naicyepyākāṅkṣā sidvā /

original: yo hi jā yātmāmānyavācitāṃ hitvā kaṃ cideva viśeṣaṃ yatra saṃbandhānubhavastaṃ vācyaṃ manyate tasya sāmānyāpratīterna viśeṣāntarāpekṣā bhavatyatha vā yathā śabdātkhatantrāmākṛtiṃ buddhyate naivaṃ kadā cidākṛtimabuddhvā vyaktimiti/

kena tarhi go tva go ūbdayoḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: gotvavāniti tu sphuṭaṃ pratyayena jātimadabhidhānaṃ vibhāgopapatteḥ /

uddiśyamāneṣu nirṇayaḥ eva

analyzed: pratīyate viśeṣaḥ yaḥ saṃśayena sa na āpyate

analyzed: siddhā sā iha viveka artham tatra bhāvasya bhāṣitā

original: na cākṛtyā na ca vyaktyā vinā tannopapadyate
analyzed: na ca ākṛtyā na ca vyaktyā vinā tat nā upapadyate
